problem.markdown:
>>The purpose of a buffer is to: <<
[x] Allow for an upstream machine to continue to work, even if one machine stops, (until the buffer between fills). [ ] Enable the material from the unfinished parts in buffers can be scavenged, if raw material of a particular type runs out. [x] Allow a machine downstream to continue to work until the buffer between them becomes empty, even if an operator is not present on one machine. [x] Increase the production efficiency of machines.
[Explanation] Buffers are often placed between operations to increase production rate in light of inevitable variability in production flow. [Explanation]
